{{{ 
@Index
@Entity
public class Transaction extends BaseEntity {
    private Date created;
    @Load
    private Ref<Show> show;
   
    public Transaction() {
        created = new Date();
    }
    
    public Transaction(Show show) {
        this();
        this.show = Ref.create(show);
    }

    public Show getShow() {
        return show.getValue();
    }

    public void setShow(Show show) {
        this.show = Ref.create(show);
    }
}
}}}
